main event: A witness observed unusual bright lights over Richmond, Indiana on May 20, 1966, for about 25 minutes.
interesting points: The sighting occurred at night at approximately 10:30 PM,The object was observed moving from south to north,The witness described the lights as too bright to be standard aircraft running lights,The witness indicated that there were two lights that seemed to disappear rapidly,The observation was made near Richmond Exit I-70.
sighted object: two unusual bright lights in the sky
witness description: A 22-year-old male with a good deal of knowledge of aircraft
